name: Miner 2D
description:
Welcome to Miner 2D!

It is a single-player game about mining, exploring, upgrading, completing quests with a... Drill Machine. The map is generated randomly, so each time you create a new game slot, there will be a different map. The ultimate goal is to repair a rocket, but you can also gather as much money as you can and relieve your wealth necessity. Now let's move on to some screenshots:

1) You can choose a tutorial mode including normal mode, interactive mode or skip tutorial mode



2) Dig underground to find a mine minerals such as coal or copper



3) Visit the shop to upgrade you drill machine

4) Visit the gas station to fill your fuel tank

5) Sell minerals to gather more money

6) Complete quests

7) Use items such as teleport...

8) ...or dynamite

Good luck!
